title: Jennifer Lawrence gets married to Cooke Maroney
text:
Actress Jennifer Lawrence has just tied the knot with her fiance Cooke Maroney on Saturday at Rhode Island.

Albeit being an immensely private event, news outlets managed to get specifics of the wedding from the rehearsal and guest list to the dinner at the event. Emma Stone, donned in a long silver outfit was photographed entering the venue with a matching overcoat. Kris Jenner was photographed arriving with her beau Gorey Gamble wearing a black outfit with silver top.

The reception included 150 guests including Amy Schumer, Sienna Miller, Adele amongst others. The rehearsal dinner also took place in Rhode Island with celebrities like Joel Madden, Cameron Diaz, Ashley Olsen and Nicole Richie in attendance. Jennifer‘s on-screen husband Bradley Cooper was also reported to be at the event.

Related: Hollywood actress Jennifer Lawrence gets engaged

The wedding took place at Belcourt of Newport, built in 1984 by an American architect Richard Morris Hunt. Jennifer opted for a gorgeous Dior gown for her big day.

Dinner of the wedding included wood-roasted fish, sweet potato flat cakes and aged beef with desserts such as cauldron fritters with bourbon cream and marshmallow s’ mores.

JLaw and Maroney have been together since June 2018. They got engaged in February 2019.
